message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget, I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  Could you do $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, I still feel that $15,000 is beyond my budget. Would it be possible for us to meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps at $14,000?
